20 
21 #include "run_loop.h"
22 
23 #if EPUB_COMPILER_SUPPORTS(CXX_THREAD_LOCAL)
24 
25 ePub3::RunLoopPtr ePub3::RunLoop::CurrentRunLoop()
26 {
27  static thread_local RunLoopPtr __myRunLoopPtr;
28  if ( !bool(__myRunLoopPtr) )
29  {
30  __myRunLoopPtr.reset(new RunLoop);
31  }
32 
33  return __myRunLoopPtr;
34 }
35 
36 #else
37 
38 #if EPUB_OS(WINDOWS)
39 # include <windows.h>
40 # include <stdio.h>
41 #if EPUB_PLATFORM(WINRT)
42 # include "ThreadEmulation.h"
43 using namespace ThreadEmulation;
44 #endif
45 # define __DestructorFn static
46 # define TLS_GET(key) TlsGetValue(key)
47 # define TLS_SET(key, data) TlsSetValue(key, data)
48 #else
49 # include <pthread.h>
50 # define __DestructorFn __attribute__((destructor)) static
51 # define TLS_GET(key) pthread_getspecific(key)
52 # define TLS_SET(key, data) pthread_setspecific(key, data)
53 #endif
54 
55 EPUB3_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
56 #if EPUB_OS(WINDOWS)
57 # if !EPUB_PLATFORM(WINRT)
58 # ifndef TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES
59 # define TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES ((DWORD)0xffffffff)
60 # endif
61 DWORD RunLoopTLSKey = TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES;
62 # endif
63 #else
64 static pthread_key_t RunLoopTLSKey;
65 #endif
66 
67 #if !EPUB_OS(WINDOWS)
68 static void _DestroyTLSRunLoop(void* data)
69 {
70  RunLoopPtr* p = reinterpret_cast<RunLoopPtr*>(data);
71  delete p;
72 }
73 #endif
74 
75 # if !EPUB_PLATFORM(WINRT)
76 static void KillRunLoopTLSKey()
77 {
78 #if EPUB_OS(WINDOWS)
79  if ( RunLoopTLSKey != TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES )
80  TlsFree(RunLoopTLSKey);
81 #else
82  pthread_key_delete(RunLoopTLSKey);
83 #endif
84 }
85 
86 INITIALIZER(InitRunLoopTLSKey)
87 {
88 #if EPUB_OS(WINDOWS)
89  RunLoopTLSKey = TlsAlloc();
90  if ( RunLoopTLSKey == TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES )
91  {
92  fprintf(stderr, "No TLS Indexes for RunLoop!\n");
93  std::terminate();
94  }
95  atexit(KillRunLoopTLSKey);
96 #else
97  pthread_key_create(&RunLoopTLSKey, _DestroyTLSRunLoop);
98 #endif
99 }
100 #endif
101 
102 RunLoopPtr RunLoop::CurrentRunLoop()
103 {
104  RunLoopPtr* p = reinterpret_cast<RunLoopPtr*>(TLS_GET(RunLoopTLSKey));
105  if ( p == nullptr )
106  {
107  p = new std::shared_ptr<RunLoop>(new RunLoop());
108  TLS_SET(RunLoopTLSKey, reinterpret_cast<void*>(p));
109  }
110  return *p;
111 }
112 
113 EPUB3_END_NAMESPACE
114 
115 #endif // !EPUB_COMPILER_SUPPORTS(CXX_THREAD_LOCAL)
